{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC Mildura Swan Hill| |callsigns = 3MIL | |coordinates = {{Coord|34|10|59.89|S|142|09|28.64|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 1990 |frequency = 104.3 [[frequency modulation|FM]]
102.1 [[frequency modulation|FM]] | |area = North West [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]] and South West [[New South Wales]] | |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://abc.net.au/milduraswanhill/ http://abc.net.au/milduraswanhill/ ] | }} {{Unreferenced|date=October 2008}}'''ABC Mildura Swan Hill''' (call sign: '''3MIL''') is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Mildura, Victoria]]. The station, opened in 1990, covers northwest [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]] and southwest [[New South Wales]], including [[Mildura, Victoria|Mildura]], [[Swan Hill]], [[Kerang, Victoria|Kerang]], and [[Ouyen, Victoria|Ouyen]]. {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Mildura]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1990]] [[Category:Radio stations in Victoria]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Mildura Swan Hill}}
